content: the horn to the head with the sewing needle and thread then thread the needle up the horn stitches and sew the 3rd and 4th stitches together so the horn bends then doing the same in another 3 stitches but on the other side so it bends in the other direction then thread the needle back down the horn and hide the tail in the head arms pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin use yellow yarn round 1 magic_ring with 8 single_crochet round 2-10 8 single_crochet finish off and leave a long tail repeat for the other arm sew the arm to either side of the body angled a bit down from horizontal see image sew looping the yarn around the raw edge of the arm so you cover and hide it sew the back side of the arm like that then also sew the front side to further secure the arm pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin tail you will be making a continuingly decreasing cone when you feel ready add some stuffing do not overfill you just need some stuffing in the base it still should be very bendy also please note that the non-decreasing rounds shift the yellow color to the left to prevent twisting see images pokeball to dragonite reversible
